results.title: Simvastatin normalizes qtc dispersion and reduces ventricular electrical instability in isolated hypercholesterolemia.
results.text_hl: After treatment, subjects in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group presented a significant decrease of total @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ and LDL-cholesterol (p<0.001) and an increase of HDL-cholesterol levels (p<0.01), associated with a reduction of both QTc @DISEASE_Glaucoma_Related_Pigment_Dispersion_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C563184 @@@dispersion@@@ (p<0.001) and @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Premature_Complexes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018879 @@@ventricular premature complexes@@@ (p<0.001).

citations.NLM: Gualdiero P, Esposito K, Ciotola M, Marfella R, Giugliano D. Simvastatin normalizes qtc dispersion and reduces ventricular electrical instability in isolated hypercholesterolemia. J Endocrinol Invest. 2002 Jun;25(6):RC16-8. PMID: 12109633
